about_the_game:
Dark is the Void is a combat focused JRPG-inspired roguelike, featuring fast paced and challenging menu-driven battles. Build and optimize your party of four from a mix of 24 classes, spanning a range from Tanks, Healers, DPS, and every hybrid inbetween. Each class features unique mechanics, UI elements, abilities, traits, and playstyles. Manage Threat, heal and protect your allies, coordinate offsenive Skillchains all simultaneously as you battle your way to the depths of the Void. How will you build your party?

  • 20 Classes, each with unique play styles and mechanics
  • 32 Zones, with its own set of enemies, bosses, and loot
  • MMO-style 'Threat' mechanics and Class roles
  • 300+ Hand-made items
  • No story to slow things down; just pure gameplay
  • Customize your character’s appearance with the in game editor
  • Explore a beautiful Pixel-art world
  • Multiple difficulty settings
  • Play with Keyboard, Mouse, Controller, or Touch-screen

name: Dark is the Void Demo
short_description: Dark is the Void is a combat focused JRPG-inspired roguelike, featuring fast paced, menu-driven battles. Build, customize, and optimize your party of four from a mix of 20 unique classes, spanning a range from Tanks, Healers, DPS, and every hybrid in between.
